ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/15/99 1:02:05 PM Eastern Daylight Time, lincus_cunningblade@hotmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/15/99 1:02:05 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
lincus_cunningblade@... writes:

<<
Yes. All of the Glowing Stiens huv been altered to the Stien of Mogguk. In
ma oppinion Verrant did tha right thin' makin' tha Stien harder ta git. It
was too easy ta mass produce.

Lincus
E'ci
>>


I agree. Also the stats seem to be changed as well. Also the Stien no
longer looks like a frigging lantern (tired of people trying to sell me
greater lightstones haha) and the stein also has one charge of lighter
healing.

Questions:

Is the spell rechargable?
Can is it be casted upon others?
how many HPs does the spell heal?

Thnx,

Wizaro WrathCaster
25th Lvl Erudite Wizard
